thread.title: Comercial score outrageous goal directly from kickoff in Sao Paulo
thread.title_full: Comercial score outrageous goal directly from kickoff in Sao Paulo

author: Chris Wright
title: Comercial score outrageous goal directly from kickoff in Sao Paulo
text:
about an hour ago Comercial score outrageous goal directly from kickoff in Sao Paulo 
For those who missed it, Comercial thrashed home side Catanduvense 4-1 down in the third tier of the Sao Paulo regional campeonato over the weekend. 
Not only was the match notable for the emphatic scoreline, but for the equally emphatic nature of one of Comercial's goals. Na A3, o camisa 10 do Comercial anotou o tal 'gol que Pelé não fez' contra o Catanduvense https://t.co/JqEjL3YY2d pic.twitter.com/7n9nR6NT7K - Mundo ESPN (@ESPNagora) March 5, 2017 
Indeed, Comercial No. 10 Mirray obviously felt that dribbling the ball all the way down field was too much hard work and instead, he simply decided to have a go directly from kickoff. 
Magnificent.
